Write-Up Text: People took to social media to discuss the recent Federal Budget in Australia with many highlighting the significant investment in healthcare and infrastructure. There was good news for renters with increased funding for Commonwealth Rent Assistance while families received support through cheaper childcare initiatives and extended Single Parent Payments. Other notable announcements included the Home Guarantee Scheme for first-home buyers increased funding for veteran services and incentives for small business owners. However there were also some negative responses such as cigarette tax increases that left smokers fuming. Overall the budget has been seen as a relief for struggling Australians.
